title: Riot point Pre paid card didn't work (Please Reply quickly)
body:
When i tried to activate my pre-paid riot point card it froze for about 10 seconds and then told me that there was an error, i re-tried the card and then it said it already had been redeemed. 

I logged out of the client and tried it again but it didnt work.
What do i do?

PS. i tried my other $25 card and that one worked but i just got scammed of another $25 card.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your best bet here would be to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to player support as they're the only ones who can help with purchase related issues.
